title: Can I do an essay in 13 hours around 6000 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: Can I do an essay in 13 hours around 6000 words? It is possible for a skilled writer to write a 6,000-word essay in 13 hours, if little or no research is required. Whether it will be a good essay depends on the writer’s skill. Generally, it is easier to write long than to write short.

Regardless of how exhausting it can be, it is possible. You need to divide your essay into main sub topics, research thoroughly and arrange your thoughts in a systematic manner in order to write a flowing essay.
